fieldUpdates.description: SFE-46 - Where an auto-response has been set, this flag is ticked to prevent further messages. WHY? Because E2C creates the case and our trigger does an update to the case before it sends an 'auto-response' therefore this will trigger the email multiples
fieldUpdates.name: Cse AutoResp Check Field If Sent
Cse Close Case Turn Off Reply Flag

fieldUpdates.description: SFE-46 - Checkbox is updated by workflows by counting Inbound + Outbound Email services. This is to notify agents that the customer has responded to the last agent's email.
fieldUpdates.name: Cse CustRepliedSinceLastInteraction OFF

fieldUpdates.description: SFE-46 - Checkbox is updated by workflows by counting Inbound + Outbound Email services. This is to notify agents that the customer has responded to the last agent's email.
fieldUpdates.name: Cse CustRepliedSinceLastInteraction ON

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Ready for testing') , NOW() , null )
fieldUpdates.name: Cse Set Dev Complete

rules.fullName: Case%3A Reset All For Re-Work
Case%3A Set Dev Complete Date
Case%3A Update Release PROD1 Date
Case%3A Update Release SIT1 Date
Case%3A Update Release UAT1 Date
Cse Assign Complaint%2FDRS to DS Quality Assurance
rules.description: Cse Assign Complaint/DRS to DS Quality Assurance
rules.formula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'ADN'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'CNG'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'GAD'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'GCP'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'HWT'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'LDR'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'NWN'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'QNP'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'QST'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'MNG'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'CNS'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'NQN'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'DBL'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'PST'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'NT')), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'QA to Investigate')) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Assign Complaint%2FDRS to NFSS - CC%2C EFT%2C CHQ%2C Casual%2C Monthly Acct
rules.description: Assign Complaint/DRS Cases that have a status of With NFSS and Refund Method of Credit Card, EFT, Cheque, Casual or Monthly Account to the NFSS Refunds queue
rules.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Status,'With NFSS'), RecordType.DeveloperName ='Complaint')&& (ISPICKVAL( Refund_Method__c , 'Credit Card Refund') || ISPICKVAL( Refund_Method__c , 'CHQ Refund') || ISPICKVAL( Refund_Method__c , 'EFT Refund') || ISPICKVAL( Refund_Method__c , 'Casual Account') || ISPICKVAL( Refund_Method__c , 'Monthly Account')) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Assign Complaint%2FDRS to NSW Customer Resolutions
rules.description: Cse Assign Complaint/DRS to NSW Customer Resolutions

rules.fullName: Cse Assign Complaint%2FDRS to QLD Customer Resolutions
rules.description: Cse Assign Complaint/DRS to QLD Customer Resolutions
rules.formula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'GCP'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'QNP'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'QST'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'CNS'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'NQN')), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'CR to Investigate')) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Assign Complaint%2FDRS to SA Customer Resolutions
rules.description: Cse Assign Complaint/DRS to SA Customer Resolutions

rules.fullName: Cse Assign Complaint%2FDRS to VIC Customer Resolutions
rules.description: Cse Assign Complaint/DRS to VIC Customer Resolutions
rules.formula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'HWT'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'LDR'), ISPICKVAL(Booking_Division__c, 'GAD')), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'CR to Investigate')) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Assign Credit Application to NFSS
rules.description: Assign Credit Application Case to NFSS Credit Application team when the Automatically Assign Case checkbox is ticked.

rules.fullName: Cse Assign RFP Case to RFP
rules.description: Rule to assign RFP cases with an RFP Team of Other to RFP Queue.

rules.fullName: Cse Assign RFP NSW Case to RFP Queue NSW
rules.description: Rule to assign RFP cases with an RFP Team of NSW to RFP Queue NSW.

rules.fullName: Cse Assign RFP QLD Case to RFP Queue NSW
rules.description: Rule to assign RFP cases with an RFP Team of QLD to RFP Queue QLD.

rules.fullName: Cse Assign RFP SA Case to RFP Queue SA
rules.description: Rule to assign RFP cases with an RFP Team of SA to RFP Queue SA.

rules.fullName: Cse Assign RFP VIC Case to RFP Queue VIC
rules.description: Rule to assign RFP cases with an RFP Team of VIC to RFP Queue VIC.

rules.fullName: Cse Assign RFP WA Case to RFP Queue WA
rules.description: Rule to assign RFP cases with an RFP Team of WA to RFP Queue WA.

rules.fullName: Cse AutoResp NFSS Account Enquiries
rules.description: Auto-Responses for NFSS Account Enquiries (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c), Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c = 1, OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(SuppliedTo__c) ), OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'NFSS_Account_Enquiries' ) ) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse AutoResp NFSS Credit Applications
rules.description: Auto-Responses for NFSS Credit Applications (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).
rules.formula: AND( NOT( OR( CONTAINS(SuppliedEmail,"@news.com.au"), CONTAINS(SuppliedEmail,"@newsltd.com.au"))), ISCHANGED(Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c), Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c=1, OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(SuppliedTo__c)), Owner:Queue.DeveloperName="NFSS_Credit_Applications") && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse AutoResp NFSS NewsPay
rules.description: Auto-Responses for NFSS_NewsPay (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c), Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c = 1, OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(SuppliedTo__c) ), OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NFSS_NewsPay' ) ) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Close Case Turn Off Reply Flag
rules.description: When a case is closed - this workflow will turn off the 'last customer interaction reply flag'

rules.fullName: Cse Complaint%2FDRS Notification
rules.description: Notification to Owner, Error Made By, Creator, Contact, and Team Lead based on Resolved status. SFE-135 JT 4/3/14 - Deactivated as request from James Coorey. DRS should be resolved and notified by phone call and not emails.
rules.formula: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Complaint' && OR( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Resolved - Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Resolved - Rejected') ) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Email Creator and Customer on Credit Application Rejected
rules.description: Email a notification to Creator and Customer when Credit Application is rejected

rules.fullName: Cse Email Creator and Customer on Credit Application Successful
rules.description: Email a notification to Creator and Customer when Credit Application is successful

rules.fullName: Cse Email FSAM on Case Close
rules.description: Email a notification to FSAM when Case is Closed

rules.fullName: Cse Email For Genesys Assmt
rules.description: Trigger publish of a Case for Assignment by Genesys
rules.formula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Origin , 'Email - Inbound for Routing - QLD'), ISPICKVAL(Origin , 'Email - Inbound for Routing') ), Ready_for_Routing__c , NOT(ISBLANK(SuppliedTo__c)), NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c) )

rules.fullName: Cse Email For Genesys Assmt - Old
rules.description: Trigger publish of a Case for Assignment by Genesys
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Origin , 'Email - Inbound for Routing') && Ready_for_Routing__c && NOT(ISBLANK(SuppliedTo__c)) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Increase Priority
rules.description: Increase the Priority on a Case (not RFP) if older than 4 hrs JT: SFE308 25/3 - Due to bug in code - raising the priority also changes the ownership to the queue. SME has reviewed this particular workflow and needs further analysis before re-activating.
rules.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Pending') , ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Open') ) && OR( ISPICKVAL(Sub_Status__c, 'Assigned') , ISPICKVAL(Sub_Status__c, 'Unassigned') ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Priority , '1-Critical')) && NOT( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'RFP') && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse NFSS Hold Queue
rules.description: Handling of Cases for NFSS Hold Queue

rules.fullName: Cse NLM Auto-Response
rules.description: Auto-Responses for NLM (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(SuppliedTo__c), ISCHANGED(Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c), Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c = 1, OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Body_Soul', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Country_style', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Country_Style_Emporium', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Delicious', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Fishing', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Gardening_Australia', BEGINS(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName, 'CC_NWN_Golf_Digest'), Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Inside_Out', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_GQ', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Masterchef', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_VET', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Vogue', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_SFI', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Taste', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Vogue_Living' ) ) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse NSW Community Auto-Response
rules.description:
Auto-Responses for NSW Community (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).
JT: 5/3/14 - Causing double up of emails to customers. The list contains similar of that to 'Cse NSW General Auto-Response'. Disabled.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c), Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c = 1, ISCHANGED(SuppliedTo__c), OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Account_Managers', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Adult', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Campaign', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_CarsGuide', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_NWN_Classifieds_Leadpages', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Display', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Funeral_Notices', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Notices', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Realestate', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Shopper' ) ) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse NSW General Auto-Response
rules.description: Auto-Responses for NSW General (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(SuppliedTo__c), ISCHANGED(Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c), Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c = 1, OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Account_Managers', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Adult', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Agency', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Campaign', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_CarsGuide', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Classifieds_Gosford', BEGINS(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName, 'CC_CNG_Classifieds'), Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_CRR', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Display', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Employment', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Notices', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_NWN_Classifieds_Leadpages', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Realestate', BEGINS(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName, 'CC_CNG_Retail_MM'), Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Shopper', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNG_Funeral_Notices', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Carsguide', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_MATP_Employment', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Gold', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Realestate', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Agency', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_C1AGENCY', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Directories', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Entertainment', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Funeral_Notices', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Market_Place', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Classifieds', BEGINS(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName, 'CC_NWN_Notices'), Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Short_Escapes', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Travel', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Go_Big_or_Go_Local', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NSW_Advertise', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NSW_MM_Careers', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NSW_MM_Display', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NSW_MM_Trades', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Trades', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_DS_NSW_Account_Managers', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_FOXTEL_classifieds' ) ) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse NSW Metro Auto-Response
rules.description: Auto-Responses for NSW Metro (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c), Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c = 1, ISCHANGED(SuppliedTo__c), OR( /* JT 7/3/14 - These are not in the XLS mapping spreadsheet under NSW METRO? It is still showing under NSW GENERAL Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Adult', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Carsguide', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_MATP_Employment', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Gold', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Realestate', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Agency', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Business', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Directories', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Entertainment', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Market_Place', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Notices', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Short_Escapes', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_Travel', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NWN_VIP' */ ) ) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Notify Agent Case not closed within SLA 2 hours
rules.description: Notify the agent if the case was not closed within the SLA of 2 hours. This rule applies to the cases of type 'Email-Inbound' that are not owned by queues.
rules.formula: AND( LEFT(Owner:Queue.QueueName , 3) <> 'CC ', Owner:Queue.QueueName <> 'NFSS NewsPay', NOT(IsClosed), ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Email - Inbound'), ISBLANK( Date_Time_Due__c ), NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c))

rules.fullName: Cse Notify Agent Case not closed within due date
rules.description: Notify the agent if the case was not closed within the due date and time set by the assigner. This rule applies to the cases of type 'Email-Inbound' that are not owned by queues. 19/3/14-SFE-334-Switched off until business review
rules.formula: AND( OR(RecordType.Id = "012O0000000CsjF", RecordType.Id= "012O0000000Cy9S") , NOT(IsClosed), ISPICKVAL(Origin,'Email - Inbound'), NOT(ISBLANK( Date_Time_Due__c )), LEFT( Owner:Queue.QueueName , 3) <> 'CC ') && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Notify Complaint or DRS Creator on SLA Exceeded
rules.description: Notify the creator of the Complaint/DRS on the SLA being exceeded
rules.formula: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Complaint' && NOT(Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agency_Account_Type') && NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Created in Error'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Resolved - Rejected'),ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed'),ISPICKVAL(Status,'Resolved - Approved'))) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Notify Complaint or DRS Creator on SLA Exceeded for Agency
rules.description: Notify the creator of the Complaint/DRS on the SLA being exceeded for Agency
rules.formula: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Complaint' && Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Agency_Account_Type' && NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Created in Error'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Resolved - Rejected'),ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed'),ISPICKVAL(Status,'Resolved - Approved'))) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Notify Tier 1 SLA passing for RFP Request
rules.description: Based on Tier, notify FSAM if Tier 1 SLA is exceeded.

rules.fullName: Cse Notify Tier 2 SLA passing for RFP Request
rules.description: Based on Tier, notify FSAM if Tier 2 SLA is exceeded.

rules.fullName: Cse Notify Tier 3 SLA passing for RFP Request
rules.description: Based on Tier, notify FSAM if Tier 3 SLA is exceeded.

rules.fullName: Cse QLD General Auto-Response
rules.description: Auto-Responses for QLD General (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(SuppliedTo__c), ISCHANGED(Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c), Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c = 1, OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_CNS_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_TNS_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_TSV_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_NewsAdvantage_Agency', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QNP_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QNP_Campaigns', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QNP_Gold', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QNP_Platinum', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QST_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QST_Platinum', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QST_Gold', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QST_Advertise', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QST_Campaigns', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_GCP_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_GCP_Gold', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_GCP_Platinum', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_GCB_Advertising', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_GCB_ClassBooking', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_GCB_Sundirectory', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QNP_QLD_Advertise', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QLD_Classifieds_Agency', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QLD_Partner_Fax', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QNP_QLD_AM_01', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QNP_QLD_AM_02', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QNP_QLD_AM_03', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QNP_QLD_AM_04', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QNP_QLD_AM_05', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_QNP_QLD_AM_06' ) ) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse QLD NAB Web Help Auto-Response
rules.description: Auto-Responses for QLD NAB WebHelp (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).

rules.fullName: Cse Record Original Queue
rules.description: Record the Queue when Case assigned to Queue

rules.fullName: Cse SA General Auto-Response
rules.description: Auto-Responses for SA General (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(SuppliedTo__c), ISCHANGED(Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c), Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c = 1, OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_ADV_Account_Managers', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_ADV_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_ADV_Display', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_ADV_Funerals', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_ADV_Photos', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_ADV_Real_Estate', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_MNG_Agency', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_MNG_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_MNG_Display', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_MNG_Trades', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_ADV_SA_DS_AM_Personals', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_ADV_SA_DS_Market_Managers', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'SA_Sales_Rep_02', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'SA_Sales_Rep_03', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_SA_DS_CareerOne', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_ADV_SA_DS_Motoring', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_ADV_SA_DS_Real_Estate', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_ADV_SA_DS1_Features', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_ADV_SA_DS2_Features', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_Proofs', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_National_Retail' ) ) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Send Credit Application
rules.description: Send the Credit Application & Direct Debit form to customer when setting to With Customer status
rules.formula: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Credit_Application' && OR(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Credit Application'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Direct Debit Application'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'NewsPay Application')) && ISPICKVAL(Status, 'With Customer') && ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'Email') && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Set Description Summary
rules.description: Set the Initial Case Description Summary

rules.fullName: Cse Set Error Made By Email
rules.description: Set the Error Made By user email on the Complaint/DRS Case

rules.fullName: Cse Set Status when Wrap Up selected
rules.description: Set the case status to Closed when Wrap Up is selected.

rules.fullName: Cse Set Sub Status
rules.description: When Owner is Changed and Sub Status = Unassigned, Change to Assigned

rules.fullName: Cse Set Team Leader Email
rules.description: Set Team Lead Email on Complaint/DRS

rules.fullName: Cse Sportsman Auto-Response
rules.description: Auto-Responses for The Sportsman (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).

rules.fullName: Cse Test Auto-Response
rules.description: This workflows allows us to test email routing rules in all other sandboxes ie. DEV SIT UAT, TRN etc. This assumes that every time you refresh the sandboxes the routing emails will need to be updated.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c), Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c = 1, ISCHANGED(SuppliedTo__c), OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_DEV_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_DEV_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_Test_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_SIT_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_SIT_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_TRN_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_TRN_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_UAT_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_UAT_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_NSW_1_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_NSW_1_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_SA_1_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_SA_1_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_NSW_1_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_NSW_1_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_QLD_1_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_QLD_1_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'TEST_CC_TRN_DirectSales', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'TEST_CC_TRN_NFSS', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'TEST_NFSS_Credit_Applications', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'UAT_Test_Queue' ) ) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Test Auto-Response SIT UAT TRN
rules.description: DELETE THIS AFTER GO LIVE!!!!
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(SuppliedTo__c)), OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED(SuppliedTo__c)), OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'UAT_Test_Queue', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'TEST_CC_TRN_DirectSales', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'TEST_CC_TRN_NFSS', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_DEV_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_DEV_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_SIT_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_SIT_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_TRN_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_TRN_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_UAT_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_UAT_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_NSW_1_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_NSW_1_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_SA_1_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_SA_1_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_NSW_1_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_NSW_1_Enquiries', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_QLD_1_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Training_QLD_1_Enquiries' ) ) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse The Australian Auto-Response
rules.description: Auto-Responses for The Australian (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c), Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c = 1, ISCHANGED(SuppliedTo__c), OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_AUS_Advertising', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_AUS_Agency', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_AUS_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_AUS_Fedgovdigital' ) ) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c)

rules.fullName: Cse Untick auto assign box
rules.description: Untick Automatically Assign Case checkbox when a RFP case is assigned to a user/queue different from the RFP Queue or when a Credit Application case is assigned to a user/queue different from the NFSS Queue.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), OR( AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'RFP', NOT(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_RFP_Requests')), AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Credit_Application' ,NOT(Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'NFSS_Credit_Applications'))) && NOT($Setup.CCNBatchJobSetting__c.Is_Case_Batch_Running__c))

rules.fullName: Cse VIC General Auto-Response
rules.description: Auto-Responses for VIC General (must use instead of standard Auto-Response due to order of processing).
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c), Apex_Count_Incoming_Emails__c = 1, ISCHANGED( SuppliedTo__c), OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_GAD_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_GAD_Priority', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_HWT_Gold_Weekly_Times', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_HWT_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_HWT_Campaigns', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_HWT_Customer_Relations', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_HWT_Gold_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_HWT_Priority', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_LDR_Campaigns', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_LDR_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_LDR_Gold_Classifieds', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_Platinum_VIC', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'CC_VIC_Features' ))

rules.fullName: NewsAdds Case Owner

criteriaItems.value: Resolved - Approved,Resolved - Rejected,Closed,Closed - Rejected,Closed - Successful,Created in Error,Duplicate

rules.description: Update the Case owner to the NewsAdds Agent Support queue when the Case has been created.
